title: Ham Bat
summaries: The Ham Bat is an early-Hardmode melee weapon that has a 4*1/25 (4%) chance to drop from Pigrons. In a Constant world, the drop chance is increased to 10*1/10 (10%).

Killing an enemy with the Ham Bat grants the Hearty Meal buff, which increases the player's health regeneration by 3 per second. This lasts for 7 seconds, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Console version]), or by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]). Hearty Meal will not stack upon killing another enemy; the duration instead resets.
The Ham Bat's damage is slightly increased if a food buff is active; see the table on the right.
